Updated November     pm



The Student Concert Committee will be holding a contest for local disc jockeys to perform during the April concert of Life in Color PERIOD

To enter applicants must submit a video of themselves performing an electronic dance music mix to the Student Concert Committee Facebook page PERIOD There students will have two weeks to vote for their favorite video PERIOD The winner will have a  minute opening set for the Life in Color concert on April  PERIOD Also included is free entry into the show and backstage access PERIOD

Contestants are required to be at least  years of age in order to participate PERIOD Submitted videos cannot be longer than five minutes and must be original mixed work PERIOD The deadline for these entries is  p.m PERIOD on March  at which time the voting begins PERIOD Voting will end at  on April  PERIOD

The Life in Color tour Unleash features mixes by Adventure Club Machine Gun Kelly and Cash Cash PERIOD The event will begin at  p.m PERIOD on April  at the France A PERIOD Crdova Recreational Sports Center parking lot PERIOD
